category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mci0PMIImportNxToTcPMIIDPropertyMap
preference.preference_description: Maps the NX product manufacturing information (PMI) ID property to the Teamcenter PMI ID property. Changing the value of this preference can lead to a loss of data created in either NX or Teamcenter when synchronizing between the two. Valid Values: Accepts two property names separated by a colon, as follows: NX-property-name:Teamcenter-property-name
